name: pla_toon (itch)
description:
My name is Braden, this is a game I've wanted to make since I was a kid and I'm finally doing it.
I started developing this project and learning game design back in January 2016,
at the time of writing this there are over 47 dev vlogs (available at pla-toon.com or youtube  www.youtube.com/c/bradenlehman) documenting the process of making this game. Needless to say I'm excited to see what the game looks like when it's finished.
